pkgmetadata.longdescription: MongoMotor: An async document-object mapper for MongoDBMongoMotor is a simple-to-use, declarative-style, document-object mapperthat puts together the nice `MongoEngine <http://mongoengine.org/>`_ APIand the clever `Motor <http://motor.readthedocs.org/en/stable/>`_ asynchronousapprouch to create a awesome library for asynchronous access to MongoDBusing python 3.4+.Take a look at the`full documentation <http://mongomotor.poraodojuca.net/>`_.
